titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13779

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Wm Stewart, Dr.

row.cell:
To.
Services in assisting in the organization of the Militia during the month of September

note.p: Approved, and the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay same out of Militia fund.

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

D, W, Lindsey
Insp Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 6th of AugustOctober, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty Three dollars and Thirty Three & one third cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Wm Stewart, Dr.

row.cell:
To
Services in assisting in the organization of the Militia during the month of September

note.p: Approved, and Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay same out of Militia fund.

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

D, W, Lindsey
Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 6th of October, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty Three dollars and Thirty Three & one third cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 12.
No Abstract.
Wm Stewart
Dollars 83. 33 1/3/100
Paid Oct. 6th 1864.
